item.title: Teams
item.description: Introduction to Teams Create a Team and add members to Team 1. Introduction to Teams To make sure that users see the dashboards and alerts that are relevant to them when using Observability Cloud, most organizations will use Observability Cloud’s Teams feature to assign a member to one or more Teams. Ideally, this matches work related roles, for example, members of a Dev-Ops or Product Management group would be assigned to the corresponding Teams in Observability Cloud.
